requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Windows 10
  • Processor: 1Ghz or above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible 3D graphics card with 512Mb or above
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

results.name: Master of Orion 2: Battle at Antares

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or higher
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card with at least 256 MB of memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: N/A
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or higher
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card with at least 256 MB of memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: N/A

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card with at least 256 MB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: N/A
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card with at least 256 MB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: N/A

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or later
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM

results.name: Sherlock: The Riddle of the Crown Jewels

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista(SP2)/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 2.4GHz
  • Graphics: 1280x720 Resolution 16-bit Color
  • Sound Card: DirectSound PCM
  • Additional Notes: Memory: 1GB for 32bit OS. 2GB for 64bit OS. DirectX required.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 2.4GHz Core 2
  • Graphics: 1280x720 Resolution 32-bit Color
  • Additional Notes: Memory: 1.5GB for 32bit OS. 3GB for 64bit OS.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 225 MB available space
